name: Rayman
overview: Rayman is a fictional character and the protagonist of the video game series of the same name, created by Michel Ancel for Ubisoft. He is depicted as a limbless humanoid with floating appendages, which he can throw at enemies to attack them. Rayman was released on a lot of platforms in the mid-90s, but was originally evisioned as a SNES game. A very early demo was released in 2017.
